Modules¶

  • Clustering modification (clustering_modification)
    • Standard Kaiser RSD model
    • Non-Gaussianity scale-dependent modifications
    • Relativistic corrections
  • Luminosity function likelihood (lumfunc_likelihood)
    • Data processing
    • Likelihood evaluation
  • Luminosity function modeller (lumfunc_modeller)
    • Quasar (QSO) luminosity function
    • Hα-emitter luminosity function
  • Utilities (utils)
